name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 001
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. #001 is inspired by the hit TV show friends which I love but James Corden is straight ruining it for me right now.
